title: Sylvanian Families: Soratobu Minna no Ookina Yume

synonyms: Sylvanian Families: Everyone's Big Dream Flying in the Sky
alternative_titles.en: Calico Critters: Everyone's Big Dream Flying in the Sky
alternative_titles.ja: シルバニアファミリー 空飛ぶみんなの大きな夢

synopsis:
In the Hazelnut Chipmunk Family, Dominic is a little boy who loves to play, but a big moment will make him more grown-up on one memorable day.

(Source: Netflix)
